definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Notice you only see plus signs here.
sentences.chinese: 注意，這裏你們只會看到加號。

sentences.english: Please put a tick in the box if this is a re-faxed form.
sentences.chinese: 如此乃重覆傳真的禮品換領表格，請於空格內加號。

sentences.english: For a domain element, the value of the attribute must start with a plus sign.
sentences.chinese: 對於域元素，該屬性的值必須以加號開始。

sentences.english: If it passed all levels, this number is suffixed with a plus sign.
sentences.chinese: 如果它通過各級，這個數字只是後綴與一個加號。

definition: yellow face, emaciated body (idiom); malnourished and sickly in appearance

pinyin: bo2 qi3 gong1 neng2 zhang4 ai4

definition: lit. the disease is cured the moment the medicine is taken (idiom)/fig. (of a medical treatment) to give instant results/(of a solution or method) highly effective
rich person's ailment (needing expensive treatment and long recuperation)
medical doctor/physician who works primarily by administering drugs, as opposed to surgeon 外科醫生|外科医生[wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1]
